title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 495-1.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 495-1.2 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Subpart
applies to any person who owns, installs, and/or uses gas-insulated equipment
(GIE) that utilizes SF
6
or other covered insulating
gas(es) as an insulating medium. (b) Annual reporting requirements shall also
apply to owners of GIE with annual GIE emissions of covered insulating gas
above 7,500 metric tons CO2e using a GWP20. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
495-1.2

Adopted

New

York State Register December 24, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 52, eff. 1/9/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
